mapper.insert: insert into tb_daily_menu( day, lunch_idstr, address_id, createtime, updatetime ) values ( #{day}, #{lunch_idstr}, #{address_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select daily_menu_id, day, lunch_idstr, createtime, updatetime from tb_daily_menu where daily_menu_id = #{daily_menu_id}
select a.daily_menu_id, a.day, a.lunch_idstr , a.address_id, a.createtime, a.updatetime from tb_daily_menu a order by a.day desc
